Name: Japocaliptyca/ Япокалиптика
About the game: Catsu is a student at Tokyo University. That day he was just going to prepare for exams, but suddenly ... Earthquake, tsunami, destruction, blood, guts (there will be no blood, to be honest, we will not show guts either, but the atmosphere of the game is appropriate) We'll have to save my life, get acquainted with Fudo freak and cute girl Asuka. Places to make a difficult moral choice. In this novel, you are waiting for dark scenes, colorful characters and exciting plot.
